The resetExclusions Statement

The ZKM Script resetExclusions statement removes

  • all exclusions that may have been set by preceding exclude statements,
  • all unexclusions that may have been set by preceding unexclude statements.

Example

resetExclusions;

Syntax

"resetExclusions" ";"
